title: Laggy Client Anyone?
body: So since I gotten the Beta client its been VERY laggy for me when I get into champ select with sometimes getting kicked for not locking in a champ. Alpha client wasnt even that laggy when i tried it out. Has anyone else got this issue?

replies.body: Yea its definitely laggy, they need to fix this before its properly released or its just gonna be worse than the client was before.
It's insanely laggy yeah, none of the times are clear cut
Mine is a little bit laggy but not so laggy to the point where I can't lock in champion.
